item.description:
Good Evening Unknown Zoners

Due to lack of Meet Up interest,
As usual,
instead of driving all of the
Way to Wallingford to watch a movie,
I am going to meet a friend in Milford at the Movie
In the Mall to watch Iron Man.

Do any of you enjoy going out to the movies?
I guess not.

We are going to see the movie Iron Man

Google Site for Iron Man

http://news.google.co....

news.google.com/news?hl=en&q=Iron+Man&um=1&ie=UTF-8&sa=X&oi=news_result&resnum=1&ct=title

Good Place for Movie Reviews

http://www.wafflemovi...

www.wafflemovies.com/


Mike B
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: 7 pm in Milford. I will probably meet my guest in the food court down stairs.
item.why: Who wants to Meet Up at the Movies in Milford on a Sunday Night?

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: UZ Witnesses Man of Iron in Milford Instead
